alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 3:55PM EST until February 26 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Charleston WV has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Muskingum River At McConnelsville affecting Washington and Morgan Counties. For the Muskingum River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Muskingum River At McConnelsville. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Flooding starts in cemetery on the southwest side of McConnelsville near State Route 376. More homes start to flood near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue to fall tonight. It will rise above flood stage Saturday morning and continue to rise to 11.3 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.3 feet on 01/15/2005. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 400 AM EST.
